SELECT 
  b.*,
  r_tech.decision as tech_decision,
  r_tech.decision_reason as tech_reason,
  rv_tech.name as tech_reviewer_name,
  r_comm.decision as comm_decision,
  r_comm.decision_reason as comm_reason,
  rv_comm.name as comm_reviewer_name
FROM bids b
LEFT JOIN reviews r_tech ON b.id = r_tech.bid_id AND r_tech.review_type = 'TECHNICAL'
LEFT JOIN reviewers rv_tech ON r_tech.assigned_to = rv_tech.id
LEFT JOIN reviews r_comm ON b.id = r_comm.bid_id AND r_comm.review_type = 'COMMERCIAL'
LEFT JOIN reviewers rv_comm ON r_comm.assigned_to = rv_comm.id
WHERE b.id = $1

SELECT id, telegram_chat_id, telegram_username, name, email
FROM reviewers
WHERE can_approve_management = TRUE
AND is_active = TRUE
ORDER BY RANDOM()
LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO reviews (
  bid_id, review_type, assigned_to, assigned_at, due_at, sla_hours
) VALUES (
  $1, 'MANAGEMENT', $2, NOW(), NOW() + INTERVAL '24 hours', 24
)
ON CONFLICT (bid_id, review_type) DO UPDATE SET
  assigned_to = $2,
  assigned_at = NOW(),
  due_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '24 hours',
  decision = 'PENDING',
  sla_breached = FALSE
RETURNING id, due_at

UPDATE bids SET
  status = 'MGMT_APPROVAL',
  current_reviewer_id = $1,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $2

UPDATE reviews SET
  notification_message_id = $1,
  notification_chat_id = $2
WHERE id = $3
